about_the_game:
theBOLL is an arcade platformer with realistic physics and carefully designed control mechanics.

Your task is to skillfully interact with the environment, overcoming various obstacles.

The game offers two styles of gameplay: speedrun the game and get into the leaderboards, or explore the levels, enjoy the process and look for easter eggs.

Key features

  • balls

  • realistic physics yet simple controls

  • chill walkthrough of the game with the search for easter eggs

  • levels optimized for speedruns

  • international leaderboards

Support us

If you like theBOLL and you want to help us develop the game - buy skins!

Rogue Thunder is an indie team, and we made theBOLL out of love for arcade games.

We want to make this game better and will listen to the community feedback.

Roadmap

Updates for the nearest future

  • release

  • more ridiculous achievements

  • more very secret secrets

  • new levels + destructions

  • improved leaderboards

  • skins change physics

  • new levels + new gameplay mechanics

BIG BOLL ENERGY!
